    • Method Detail

      • getHttp

        public static org.gbif.utils.HttpUtil getHttp()
        Initializes and configures the HttpUtil instance, which is what the IPT/Legacy WS consumers use to issue HTTP requests. This method copies the same configuration as the IPT uses, to ensure the exact same structured requests are sent during unit testing.

      • getRequestUri

        public static String getRequestUri(String path)
        Construct request URI, appending path to local Grizzly server address.
        Parameters:
        path - path
        Returns:
        request URI
